allow: Bash(node -e "const p = require\(''pdf-parse''\); console.log\(typeof p, Object.keys\(p\)\)")
Bash(node -e "const { PDFParse } = require\(''pdf-parse''\); const p = new PDFParse\(\); console.log\(typeof p, Object.getOwnPropertyNames\(Object.getPrototypeOf\(p\)\)\)")
Bash(node -e "const { PDFParse } = require\(''pdf-parse''\); const p = new PDFParse\(\); console.log\(Object.getOwnPropertyNames\(Object.getPrototypeOf\(p\)\).filter\(n => n !== ''constructor''\)\)")
Bash(node -e "const pp = require\(''pdf-parse''\); const p = new pp.PDFParse\(\); console.log\(typeof p.loadPDF, typeof p.parseBuffer\)")
